resources.string: London, the capital of England and the United Kingdom, is a 21st-century city with history stretching back to Roman times.
More than half of the London Underground network in fact runs above ground.
The GDP of London is significantly larger than that of several European countries, including Belgium and Sweden.
To get a London taxi license, you have to prove that you know every single street and landmark in London. It’s called “The Knowledge” and takes 2–4 years to memorize.
